'''Magnar Sætre''' (12 November 1940 &ndash; 5 December 2002) was a Norwegian politician for the [[Norwegian Labour Party|Labour Party]].

He was born in [[Bergen]].

He was elected to the [[Stortinget|Norwegian Parliament]] from [[Rogaland]] in 1989, and was re-elected on one occasion. He had previously served in the position of deputy representative during the term 1985&ndash;1989.

Sætre was a member of [[Haugesund]] city council from 1971 to 1975.
